text:
H-hello...!
Um...! Uh, about the heart──

...!
Is the pose okay with both of us making a heart?

...Ah, I'm going to make a heart,
but I wanted Hana-chan to do a thumbs-up...!

...? Um──
You mean the pose with a fist? Is this okay?

Okay! Let's start the shoot now!
3, 2, 1──

(Things don't always go as planned, but...
Hana is doing her best...!)
